data.projectDescription: Developed a Semantic Role Labeling system using BERT to predict actor-action pairs from news articles, integrating advanced NLP techniques like spaCy for NER, Dependency Parsing, and Coreference Resolution.

Created a P2P file sharing software like BitTorrent in JAVA, implementing the choking-unchoking mechanism for efficient file distribution. The project used TCP for peer-to-peer communication and handled file piece exchange using custom protocols.

data.projectTitle: GatorLibrary System with Minheap and Red-Black Tree
data.projectDescription: Developed GatorLibrary, a system leveraging Minheap and Red-Black Tree for efficient data retrieval, using React for the frontend, Spring Boot, and MySQL for database management.
